_sText:
Defend the complex, then run to the roofs to use the chair lifts to escape!

This map is a bit like zm atic panic. 
(warning! this map contains camping, with phys barricades)

b2 fixes
==================
- more fps
- new ladder up to the top level
- zombies can now climb the mountain
- more props
- added some more 3D skybox detail

You must run into the complex and survive for 2 mins. Then doors open and you must get to the roof. after that your must ride a chair lift up to the safe zone. Here you must hold for 1 min.

I optimized the map as best I could however I know its not perfect. I will work on that for the next version.
